questions.text: Does the individual have a basic skills need that can be met by the JCP
questions.name: basic-skills-need

questions.text: Is the individual doing any form of paid employment?
questions.name: paid-employment

questions.text: Has the individual previously been on the Work and Health programme?
questions.name: previous-whp

questions.text: Has the JSP officer already helped the individual with their core job search activity?
questions.name: core-help

questions.text: Do you consider the individual will realistically find employment in the next 12 months with solely support of the JSP offer?
questions.name: sole-support

questions.text: Do you consider that the individual will realistically find employment in the next 12 months?
questions.name: find-employment

questions.text: The individual has a realistic job goal?
questions.name: real-goal

questions.text: Is there any other provision which would be more suited for the individual's needs and help them to find work?
questions.name: other-provision
